attributes.action: ensure all applicable road taxes are made in one yearly payment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are lots and lots of road taxes that effect all drivers, normal road tax, fuel tax, congestion charges. 

We are taxed more than any other European country to use the roads and most are stealth taxes. 

Lets scrap fuel taxes, congestion charges and all other road taxes just have one tax so we know exactly what we have to pay and where its going, if necessary spread the cost in interest free monthly payments.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
